title: Universe/Frames/AxesIpf
description: Configuration for AxesIpf axes in frames plugin

file.description: Attitude IPF file path (assuming parent frame is ICRF)

interpOrder.description: Optional interpolation order for the IPF. If not given, hard coded InterpolationDefaults are used

mapping.description: Custom mapping to be used to define the axes names of the reference axes
mapping.default: all IPF axes code are mapped to ICRF.

keysTimeScale.description: Defines the timescale of the IPF keys
